metadataAttributes.Title: Integral Calculus and Numerical Analysis for Data Science
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Are you interested in Data Science but lack the math background for it? Has math always been a tough subject that you tend to avoid? This course will provide an intuitive understanding of foundational integral calculus, including integration by parts, area under a curve, and integral computation. It will also cover root-finding methods, matrix decomposition, and partial derivatives.
